answer: An annual inspection does meet the requirements of the 100-hour inspection. The components of each are described in Appendix D of 14 CFR ยง43. A 100-inspection does not necessarily meet the requirements of an annual inspection unless it is also approved as an annual inspection by the holder of an FAA Inspection Authorization (IA).
question: Will an annual inspection meet the requirements of a 100-hour inspection? Vice versa?
